name: gd_pwr
description:
A simple reactor control game on Godot Engine

This is a simple game about controlling a nuclear reactor.

Created by Godot Engine v2.1.4 stable, for Ushanka GodotJam (https://itch.io/jam/ushanka-gdjam)

Source: https://github.com/sh-sergey/gd_pwr

Cover by https://blanccroix.deviantart.com/
